template.name: Random Tracks for Pre-Defined Custom Tags
template.description:
Random tracks for pre-defined custom tags with multiple specified values.
Currently available pre-defined tags: STYLE, MOOD, RECORDLABEL

parameter.name: Playlist name
parameter.value: Random Tracks for Pre-Defined Custom Tags

parameter.name: Include tracks for selected STYLE tags
parameter.data: select id,value,value from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' and attr='STYLE' group by value order by valuesort asc

parameter.name: Exclude tracks for selected STYLE tags
parameter.data: select id,value,value from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' and attr='STYLE LABEL' group by value order by valuesort asc

parameter.name: Include tracks for selected MOOD tags
parameter.data: select id,value,value from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' and attr='MOOD' group by value order by valuesort asc

parameter.name: Exclude tracks for selected MOOD tags
parameter.data: select id,value,value from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' and attr='MOOD' group by value order by valuesort asc

parameter.name: Include tracks for selected RECORDLABEL tags
parameter.data: select id,value,value from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' and attr='RECORDLABEL' group by value order by valuesort asc

parameter.name: Exclude tracks for selected RECORDLABEL tags
parameter.data: select id,value,value from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' and attr='RECORDLABEL' group by value order by valuesort asc

parameter.name: Only include tracks after or equal to this year
Only include tracks before or equal to this year
